Name: Elixirita
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Basically, a Tommy's Margarita with a splash of cognac served straight-up.
History: Created in 2007 by H. Joseph Ehrmann , this is the signature Margarita at his bar Elixir in San Francisco, USA. He dedicated it to the Boston College Eagles.
Nutrition: One serving of Elixirita contains 197 calories
